title: 55 Degrees North
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, British, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a small separate section on menu for vegetarian and vegan items. Also, items not in this section are clearly marked with a V for vegetarian and VN for vegan. Gluten-free also clearly marked. The portion sizes are quite large. Staff is friendly and attentive. Has a beautiful view. Wi-Fi.
